si.title: HPV එන්නත ලබා ගැනීමෙන් පසු අසනීප වූ පාසල් සිසුවියන් පස් දෙනෙකු රෝහල් ගත කර තිබේ
body_lines: Five 12-year-old schoolgirls have been hospitalized after experiencing adverse reactions following the administration of the Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) vaccine, which is given to prevent cervical cancer, at school.
The affected students, all seventh graders of Venivelpitiya Junior College in Anguruwathota, fell ill shortly after receiving the vaccine, the police said.

A team from the Millaniya Medical Officer of Health (MOH) office had vaccinated 26 female students in the school, but five of them soon displayed symptoms including headaches, abdominal pain, and fainting.

රෝගී සිසුන් මුලින් මිලානියා ප්රජා කාර්යාලයේ නිලධාරීන් විසින් මලේබෝටා ප්රාදේශීය රෝහල වෙත ගෙන යන ලද අතර එහිදී ඔවුන්ට හදිසි ප්රතිකාර ලැබුණි. Subsequently, they have been transferred to Horana District Hospital for further treatment.
රෝහල් ප්රකාශකයෙකු පවසන පරිදි, සිසුන් මේ වන විට වෝඩ් අංකවල ප්රතිකාර ලබති. 6 and are in stable condition.
All five girls are residents of Venivelpitiya, the police said.
Anguruwathota Police have received a formal complaint regarding the incident, and are conducting further investigations.

ta.title: Five schoolgirls who fell ill after receiving HPV vaccine hospitalized
body_lines: Five 12-year-old schoolgirls have been hospitalized after experiencing adverse reactions following the administration of the Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) vaccine, which is given to prevent cervical cancer, at school.
The affected students, all seventh graders of Venivelpitiya Junior College in Anguruwathota, fell ill shortly after receiving the vaccine, the police said.

மில்லானியா சுகாதார மருத்துவ அதிகாரி (MOH) அலுவலகத்தின் ஒரு குழுவுக்கு பள்ளியில் 26 பெண் மாணவர்களுக்கு தடுப்பூசி போடியது, ஆனால் அவர்களில் ஐந்து பேர் விரைவில் தலைவலி, வயிற்று வலி மற்றும் மயக்கம் உள்ளிட்ட அறிகுறிகளைக் காட்டினர்.

The sick students were initially taken to Haltota Regional Hospital by officers from the Millaniya MOH office, where they received emergency treatment. பின்னர், அவர்கள் மேலதிக சிகிச்சைக்காக ஹொரானா மாவட்ட மருத்துவமனைக்கு மாற்றப்பட்டுள்ளனர்.
மருத்துவமனை செய்தித் தொடர்பாளரின் கூற்றுப்படி, மாணவர்கள் தற்போது வார்டு எண். 6 and are in stable condition.
All five girls are residents of Venivelpitiya, the police said.
இந்த சம்பவம் தொடர்பாக அங்குருவதோட்டா காவல்துறையினர் முறையான புகார் பெற்றுள்ளனர், மேலும் விசாரணைகளை மேற்கொண்டு வருகின்றனர்.
